thread.section_title: Firmoo Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Firmoo | www.firmoo.com | 2 of 13
thread.title: kamarr richee

author: kamarr richee
title: kamarr richee
text: Firmoo has consistently given me the freedom of buying multiple frames to go with each of my moods. i recently had a problem with my order for the first time, and there was no fighting; they gave me a refund, let me talk with a real, actual human, and left me wanting to buy even more pairs! there's almost always a deal or sale going on, and they add new frames all the time, so id you have a limited budget but a limitless sense of style, definitely check these guys out.
